GSP33brsvbh4u:1: nābhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayaṃ pravṛttā na cetare śakyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:3: śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:9: codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:10: yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:18: na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante /
GSP33brsvbh4u:20: na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro 'ntareṇamādhuryasākṣātkāraṃ sahasreṇāpyupapattibhirnivartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:21: atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya guḍatyāgāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:28: tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:32: virodhe vā tasya nityatvānnāvidyodīyeta kuta eva tu tena sahānuvarteta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:36: na khalu jyotiṣṭomavākyārthapratyayaḥ śataśo 'pyāvartamānaḥ sākṣātkārapramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye janayati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:41: vākyaṃ cedyuktyapekṣaṃ sākṣātkārāya prabhavati tathā sati kṛtamāvṛtyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:44: na yuktivākye sākṣātkāraphale pratyakṣasyaiva pramāṇasya tatphalatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:45: te tu parokṣārthāvagāhinī sāmānyamātramabhiniviśate natu viśeṣaṃ sākṣātkuruta iti tadviśeṣasākṣātkārāyāvṛttirupāsyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:46: sā hi satkāradīrghakālanairantaryasevitā satī dṛḍhabhūmirviśeṣasākṣātkārāya prabhavati kāminībhāvaneva straiṇasya puṃsa iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:49: sa khalvayaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ śāstra yuktiyonirvā syādbhāvanāmātrayonirvā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:50: na tāvatparokṣābhāsavijñānaphale śāstrayuktī sākṣātkāralakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalaṃ prasotumarhataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:55: kaścitkhalu śuddhasatvogarbhastha iva vāmadevaḥ śrutvā ca matvā ca kṣaṇamavadhāya jīvātmano brahmātmatamanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:57: ataścāvṛttiranarthikā yanniraṃśasya grahaṇamadgrahaṇaṃ vā na tu vyaktāvyaktatve sāmānyavaśeṣavatpadmarāgādivadityata āha--api cānekāṃśeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:59: ayamabhisandhiḥ---satyaṃ na brahmasākṣātkāraḥ sākṣādāgamayuktiphalamapi tu yuktyāgamārthajñānāhitasaṃskārasacivaṃ cittameva brahmaṇi sākṣātkāravartīṃ buddhivṛttiṃ samādhatte /
GSP33brsvbh4u:60: sā ca nānumānitavahnisākṣātkāravatprātibhatvenāpramāṇaṃ tadānīṃ vahnisvalakṣaṇasyaparokṣatvātsadātanaṃ tu brahmasvarūpasyopādhirūpitasya jīvasyāparokṣatvam
GSP33brsvbh4u:62: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhādisvabhāvo brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:72: pratyayapravāhe sākṣātkārāvadhau vyaktitāratamyaṃ prati kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:73: tadevaṃ vākyamātrasyārthe 'pi na drāgityeva pratyaya ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:74: tattvamasīti tu vākyamatyantadurgrahapadārthaṃ na padārthajñānapūrvake svārthe jñāne drāgityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:76: syādetat padārthasaṃsargātmā vākyārthaḥ padārthajñānakrameṇa tadadhīnanirūpaṇīyatayā kramavatpratītiryujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:77: brahma tu niraṃśatvenāsasṛṣṭanānātvapadārthakamiti kasyānukramema kramavatī pratītiriti
GSP33brsvbh4u:78: sakṛdeva tadgṛhyeta na vā gṛhyatetyuktamityata āha---yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:81: tatkiṃmiyameva vākyajanitā pratītirātmani tathāca na sākṣātpratītirātmanyanāgataphalatvādasya ityata āha---tattu pūrvarūpamevātmapratipatteḥ sākṣātkāravatyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:82: etaduktaṃ bhavati---vākyārthaśravaṇamananottarakālā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī bhāvanā brahma sākṣātkārāya kalpata iti vākyārthapratītiḥ sākṣātkārasya pūrvarūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:85: duḥkhitvādipratyayaścātmani sarveṣāṃ sarvadotpadyata ityabādhitatvātsamīcīna iti balavānna śakyo 'panetumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:90: uktaṃ cāsya tatra tatropapatyā bādhanamevaṃ duḥkhitvādyabhimāno 'pi tathā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:91: nahi nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasyātmanā upajanāpāyadharmāṇo duḥkhaśokādaya ātmāno bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:93: nahi gauraśvasya dharmaḥ saṃbandhasyāpi vyatirekāvyatirekābhyāṃ saṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāṃ ca vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:99: kasmādanubhavārtha evāvṛtyabhyupagamo yāvatā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavya ityādibhistatvamasivākyaviṣayādanyaviṣayaivāvṛttirvidhāsyata ityata āha---tatrāpi na tatvamasivākyārthāditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:100: ātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityādyātmaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:101: na ca tattvamasīvākyaviṣayādanyadātmadarśanamāmnātaṃ yenopakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:102: sadeva somyedamiti copakramya tattvamasītyupasaṃhṛta iti sa eva vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:106: nanu vidhipradhānatvādvākyasya na bhūtārthapradhānatvaṃ bhūtastvarthastadaṅgatayā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:107: yathāhuḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam'ityādi śābaraṃ vākyaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ--'kāryamarthamavagamayantī
GSP33brsvbh4u:109: yathā tāvadbhūtārthaparyavasitā vedāntā na kāryavidhiniṣṭāstathopapāditaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt'
GSP33brsvbh4u:114: yadyapi tatvamasītyādyāḥ śrutayaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ pratipādayanti tathāpi
GSP33brsvbh4u:119: naca yathā samāropitaṃ sarpatvamanūdya rajjutvaṃ purovartino dravyasyavidhīyata evaṃ prakāśātmano jīvabhāvamanūdya paramātmatvaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:120: yuktaṃ hi purovartini dravye drāghīyasi sāmānyarūpeṇālocite viśeṣarūpeṇāgṛhīte viśeṣāntarasamāropaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:121: iha tu prakāśātmano nirviśeṣasāmānyasyāparādhīnaprakāśasya nāgṛhītamasti kiñcidrupamiti kasya viśeṣasyāgrahe kiṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ samāropyatām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:122: tasmādbrahmaṇo jīvabhāvāropāsaṃbhavājjīvo jīvo brahma ca hrahmeti tattvamasīti pratīkopadeśa eveti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:123: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate---śvetaketorātmaiva parameśvaraḥpratipattavyo na tu śvetaketorvyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:124: bhede hi gauṇatvāpattirna ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:125: apica pratīkopadeśe sakṛdvacanaṃ tu pratīyate bhedadarśananindā ca(?) /
GSP33brsvbh4u:130: naca mānāntaravirodha ityādi tu sarvamupāditaṃ prathamādhyāye /
GSP33brsvbh4u:131: niraṃśasyāpi cānādyanirvācyāvidyātadvāsanāsamāropitavividhaprapañcātmanaḥ sāṃśasyeva kasyacidaṃśasyāgrahaṇādvibhrama iva paramārthastu na vibhramo nāma kaścinna ca saṃsāro nāma /
GSP33brsvbh4u:134: anye 'pyāhuḥ---'yadyadvaite na toṣo 'sti mukta evāsi sarvadā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:137: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:138: yathā hi śāstroktaṃ śuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ brahmātmatvenaiva jīvenopāsyate 'haṃ brahmāsmi
GSP33brsvbh4u:139: tattvamasi śvetaketo ityādiṣu tkasya hetorjīvātmano brahmarūpeṇa tātvikatvādadvitīyamiti śruteśca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:140: jīvātmānaścāvidyādarpaṇā yathā brahmapratibimbakāstathā yatra yatra mano brahmādityo
GSP33brsvbh4u:141: brahmetyādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭerupadeśastatra sarvatrāhaṃ mana ityādi draṣṭavyaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh4u:152: tasmādyasya yanmātrātmatayopāsanaṃ vihitaṃ tasya tanmātrātmatayaiva pratipattavyaṃ 'yāvadvacanaṃ vācanikam 'iti nyāyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:154: naca sarvasya vākyajātasya prapañcasya vilayaḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:155: tadarthatve hi mana iti pratīkagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ viśvamiti vācyaṃ yathā sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:163: nanu yathāvacchinnasyāhaṅkarāspadasyānavacchinnabrahmātmatayā bhavatyabhāva evaṃ pratīkānāmapi bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svarūpopamarde ca nāmādīnāmiti
GSP33brsvbh4u:168: etadato bhavati---pradhānībhūtānāṃ na pratīkānāmucchedo yukto naca taducchede vidheyasyāpyupapattiriti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:172: tathāca tatra yathālokapratītivyavasthito jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī na brahmeti kathaṃ tasya brahmātmatayābrahmadṛṣṭyupadeśeṣvātmadṛṣṭirupadiśyatetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:175: pratīkāni tu manaḥprabhṛtīnibrahmavikārastathāpyavacchinnatayā jīvātmanaḥ pratīkaiḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam //4//
GSP33brsvbh4u:178: yadyapi sāmānādhikaraṇmubhayathāpi ghaṭate tathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣatayā phalaprasavasāmarthyena
GSP33brsvbh4u:181: na caivaṃvidhe 'vadhṛte śāstrārthe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭinorkṛṣṭa iti laukiko nyāyo 'pavādāya prabhavatyāgamavirodhena tasyaivāpoditatvāditi pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:182: satyaṃ sarvādhyakṣatayā phaladātṛtvena brahmaṇa eva sarvatra vāstavaṃ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi śabdagatyanurodhena kvacitkarmaṇa eva prādhānyamavasīyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:185: atra hi sarvatra yāgādyārādhitā devataiva phalaṃ prayacchatīti sthāpitaṃ tathāpi śabdataḥ karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvāvagamane phalavatvapratīteḥ prādhānyam
GSP33brsvbh4u:188: tadiha yadyapi sarvādhyakṣatayā vastuto brahmaiva phalaṃ prayacchati tathāpi śāstraṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:189: brahmabuddhyā'dityādau pratīka upāsyamāne brahma phalāya kalpate ityabhivadati kiṃvādityādibuddhyā
GSP33brsvbh4u:190: brahmaiva viṣayīkṛtaṃ phalāyetyubhayathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣasya phaladānopapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:193: na kevalaṃ laukiko nyāyo niścaye heturapi tu ādityādiśabdānāṃ prāthamyena mukhyārthatvamapītyāha---prāthamyācceti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:195: tathāhi----svarapravṛtyā ādityādiśabdā yathā svārthe vartante tathā brahmaśabdo 'pi svārthe vartsyati yadi svārtho 'sya vipakṣitaḥsyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:196: tathācetiparatvamanarthakaṃ tasmāditīnā svārthātpracyāvya brahmapadaṃ jñānaparaṃ svarūpaparaṃ vā kartavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:198: pratītipara evāyamitiparaḥśabdo yathā gauriti me gavayo 'bhavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:199: tathāca ādityādayo brahmeti pratipattavyā ityartho bhavatītyāha---itiparatvādapi brahmaśabdasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:204: satsvapi ādityādiṣu phalānutpādādutpattimataḥ karmaṇa eva phaladarśanātkarmaiva phalavat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:207: ādityādiṣu punarudgīthādidṛṣṭāvudgīthādibudyopāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakaḥsantaḥ phalāya kalpiṣyanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:208: ata eva ca pṛthvyagnyorṛksāmaśabdaprayoga upapanno yataḥ pṛthvyāmṛgdṛṣṭiradhyastāgnau ca sāmadṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:209: sāmni punaragnidṛṣṭau ṛci ca pṛthvīdṛṣṭau viparītaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:212: evaṃ khalvadhikaraṇanirdeśo viṣayatvapratipādanapara upapadyate yadi lokeṣu sāmadṛṣṭiradhyasyeta nānyatheti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:216: nahyādityādibhiḥ kiñcitkriyate yadvidyayā vīryavattaraṃ bhavedādityādimatyā vidyayodgīthādikarmasu
GSP33brsvbh4u:217: kāryeṣu yadeva vidyaya karoti tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatītyādityamatīnāmupapadyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:220: yatra hi karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tatraivaṃ bhavatu yatra tu guṇātaphalaṃ tatra guṇasya siddhatvenākāryatvātkarotītyeva nāstītyatra vidyāyāḥ kva upayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:222: na tāvadguṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ kāryāya phalāya paryāptaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:224: tasmātprakṛtāpūrvasaṃniveśinaḥ phalotpāda iti tasya kriyamāṇatvena vidyayā vīryavattaratvopapattiriti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:229: nanūktaṃ siddharūpairādityādibhiradhyastaiḥ sādhyabhūtatvamabhibhūtaṅkarmaṇāmityata āha---ādityādibhāvenāpi ca dṛśyamānānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:231: api tu māṇavaka ivāgnidṛṣṭiḥ kenacittīvratvādinā guṇena gauṇyanabhibhūtamāṇavakatvāttathehāpi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:239: tatra yadi sāmadhīradhyasyeta tato na sāmānyupāsyeran api tu lokāḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:240: tathā ca dvitīyārthaṃ parityajya tṛtīyārthaḥ parikalpayeta sāmneti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:242: akāre gāvo vāsyantāṃ prāvāre kusumānītivat tenoktanyāyānurodhena saptamyāścobhayathāpyavaśyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:246: tatrāpi samastasya saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanamiti sāmna upāsyatvaśruteḥ sādhviti pañcavidhasya /
GSP33brsvbh4u:249: hiṅkārānuvādena pṛthivīdṛṣṭividhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivīti prāpte viparītanirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ //6//
GSP33brsvbh4u:252: karmāṅgasaṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaṃ tatra tatsaṃbaddhopāsānāpi tiṣṭhataiva kartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:255: pramāṇatantrā ca vastuvyavasthā pramāṇaṃ ca .....nāpekṣata iti tatrāpyaniyamaḥ(?) /
GSP33brsvbh4u:259: tatra codakaśāstrābhāvādaniyame prāpte yathā śakyata ityupabhandhādāsīnasyaiva siddham /
GSP33brsvbh4u:260: nanu yasyāmavasthāyāṃ dhyāyatirupacaryate prayujyate kimasau tadā tiṣṭhato na bhavati na bhavatītyāha /
GSP33brsvbh4u:269: same śucau śarkarāvahnivālukāvivarjita ityādivacanānniyame siddhe digdeśādiniyamamavācanikamapi prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajetetivadvaidikārambhasāmānyātkvacitkaścitadāśaṅkate
GSP33brsvbh4u:275: ā prayāṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam / BBs_4,1.12 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:278: śāstraṃ hi niyojyasya kāryarūpaniyogasaṃbandhamavabodhayati tasyaiva karmaṇyaiśvaryalakṣaṇamadhikāraṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:280: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭatvānnāstīha tirohitamiva kiñcaneti kimatra śāstraṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:281: nanvevamapyabhyudayaphalānyupāsanāni tatra niyojyaniyogalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇi svāmitālakṣaṇasya
GSP33brsvbh4u:286: tāni khalu āprāyaṇaṃ tattadupāsyagocarabuddhipravāhavāhitayā dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa prāyaṇasamaye tadbuddiṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:287: kimatra phalavatprāyaṇasamaye buddhyākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:290: tathā ca śrutiḥ sarvādīndriyaviṣaya--'sa yathākraturasmāllokāt praiti tātkraturhāmuṃ lokaṃ pretyabhisaṃbhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:297: tatra tāvatprathamamidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ brahmādhigame brahmajñāne sati brahmajñānaphalānmokṣādviparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ bandhanaphalaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyata iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:299: śāstreṇa hi phalāya yadvihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ cānarthaparihārāyāśvamedhādi brahmahatyādi
GSP33brsvbh4u:301: sa hi tasya vināśahetustadabhāve kathaṃ vinaśyediti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:303: adattaphalaṃ cetkarmāpūrvaṃ vinaśyati karmaṇa eva phalaprasavasāmarthyabodhakaśāstramapramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:304: naca prāyaścittamiva brahmajñānamadattaphalānyapi karmapūrvāṇi kṣiṇotīti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:306: ata eva smaranti nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:307: yadi punarapekṣitopāyatātmā prāyaścittavidhirna niyojyaviśeṣapratilambhamātreṇa nirvṛṇotītyapekṣitākāṅkṣāyāṃ doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāttannibarhaṇaphalaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:310: śāstraprāmāṇyātsaṃbhaviṣyatyasāvavasthā yasyāmupabhogena samastakarmakṣaye brahmajñānaṃ mokṣaṃ prasoṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:311: yogādhdyairva vā divi bhuvyantarīkṣe bahūni śarīrendriyāṇi nirmāya phalānyupabhujyarddhena yogasāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:312: sthite caitasminnarthe nyāyabalādyathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādivyapadeśo brahmavidyāstutimātraparatayā
GSP33brsvbh4u:313: vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate--vyākhyāyetaivaṃ vyapadeśo yadi karmavidhivirodhaḥ syānna tvayamasti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:314: śāstraṃ hi phalotpādanasāmarthyamātraṃ karmaṇāmavagamayati na tu kutaścidāgantukānnimittataḥ prāyaścittādestadapratibandhamapi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:316: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta eveti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:319: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:320: nahi tattvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhoktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:321: nahi rajjavāṃ bhujaṅkasamāropanibandhanā bhayakampādayaḥ sati rajjutatvasākṣātkāre prabhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh4u:323: amumevārthamanuvadanto yathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādayo vyapadeśāḥ samavetārthāḥ santo na stutimātratayā kathañcidvyākhyānamarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:324: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:326: mokṣī saṃpatsyata ityata āha---evameva ca mokṣa upapadyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:327: anādikālapravṛttā hi karmāśayā aniyatakālavipākāḥ kramavatā tāvadbhogena kṣetumaśakyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:333: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣu sukhaduḥkhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato
GSP33brsvbh4u:334: brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni bhokṣyanta ityāha--naca
GSP33brsvbh4u:336: nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:343: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:347: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:348: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:353: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:354: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:356: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi'iti ca sāmānyavacanaṃ 'sarve pāpmānaḥ'iti viśeṣaśravaṇātpāpakarmāṇīti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:357: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānte 'tidiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:358: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti kathametadapi nocchindyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:359: evaṃ ca sati na śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturnahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:365: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartanta ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh4u:368: anārabdhakārya eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:374: māyāvādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatsaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:375: naca rajjau sarpādivibhramajanitā bhayakampādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:376: tatrāpi sarpāsattve 'pi tajjñānasya sattve tajjanitabhayakampādīnāṃ tatsaṃskārāṇāṃ ca vastusattvena nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame 'nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:377: atra tu na māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:379: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsya iti śruterdehapātapratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:381: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsnāto bhuñjānaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:382: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā pratipādyate ubhayavidhāne
GSP33brsvbh4u:385: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhūtasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ karmajātam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:387: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaraṇatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet
GSP33brsvbh4u:388: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tattvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:389: na caite mahādhiyo na brahmavido brahmacidaścālpapuṇyamedhaso manuṣyā iti śraddheyaṃ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:390: tasmādāgamānusārato 'sti prārabdhavibhāgānāṃ karmaṇāṃ prakṣayāya tadīyasamastaphalopabhogapratīkṣā satyapi tattvasākṣātkāre /
GSP33brsvbh4u:392: api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ---na tāvadanāśrityārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayamiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:393: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadvirodhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata ityāha---akartrātmabodho 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:394: yadā loke 'pi virodhinoḥ kiñcitkālaṃ sahānuvṛttirupalabdhā tadehagamabalāddīrghakālamapi bhavatīti na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP33brsvbh4u:396: tadevaṃ madhyasthānpratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyante tān pratyāha---apica naivātra vivaditavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:403: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:410: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:413: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:415: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛbhoktṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:416: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:419: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:423: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:424: tadanenābhisamadhinoktaṃ--jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:425: yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:432: kāmyakarmaviṣayamaśleṣavināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17//
GSP33brsvbh4u:435: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:437: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyānna brāhmaṇabruvāya mūrkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt
GSP33brsvbh4u:440: prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karoti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
GSP33brsvbh4u:443: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18//
GSP33brsvbh4u:445: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:446: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh4u:447: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt //19//
GSP33brsvbh4u:448: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh4u:452: athāsmin phalavicāralakṣaṇe vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata ityādivicāro 'saṃgata ityata āha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:454: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:455: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante'iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:469: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viśiṃṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:476: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
GSP33brsvbh4u:477: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:484: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu vṛttilayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:485: ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:486: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh4u:489: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:490: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:492: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:494: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--satyam,
GSP33brsvbh4u:497: svayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:498: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:499: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3//
GSP33brsvbh4u:502: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:506: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate---sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:514: vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:521: tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo 'vagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:522: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:527: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:530: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyakṣasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastejasīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:554: karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:558: atrāmṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:565: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:566: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ tadanuguṇatayā teṣāmanuvāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:572: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:573: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:575: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:580: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:582: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:586: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratattvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:587: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:590: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti sāṃpratamityāha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:598: athetarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasyāśrayabhūtamutkramaddehāddehāntaraṃ vā saṃcaratkasmādasmābhirna nirīkṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:600: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram--
GSP33brsvbh4u:604: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:605: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:606: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe--
GSP33brsvbh4u:608: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:612: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:622: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt / BBs_4,2.12 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:629: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhacchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:631: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥśreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:632: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:633: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:640: tathā hi--ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:641: parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:644: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:647: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:649: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:652: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33brsvbh4u:653: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena tanniṣidhyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:654: apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti gatirityāha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:656: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:665: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.15 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:667: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:676: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:681: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:684: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā / BBs_4,2.17 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:686: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva,
GSP33brsvbh4u:689: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyoccikramiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:690: tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati
GSP33brsvbh4u:697: hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:698: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati
GSP33brsvbh4u:699: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17//
GSP33brsvbh4u:702: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18//
GSP33brsvbh4u:707: na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.19b /
GSP33brsvbh4u:710: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayasta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante avistāryante te raśmayo 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:713: candramasā khalvammayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:715: ye tyāhuḥ--sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchediti nirapekṣaśravaṇādrātrau prete nāsti raśmyapekṣeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:719: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti tānpratyāha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:721: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:722: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate tanmatamāśaṅkyāha---
GSP33brsvbh4u:735: viduṣo 'pi ca bhīṣmasyottarāyaṇapratīkṣaṇamaviduṣa ācāraṃ grāha-yati 'yadyadācarati śreṣṭhastattadevetaro janaḥ'iti nyāyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:742: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:743: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.21 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:744: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:745: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrutau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:746: atha tu pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21//
GSP33brsvbh4u:747: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 // // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh4u:753: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:755: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā
GSP33brsvbh4u:756: evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte pratyucyate-ekatve
GSP33brsvbh4u:759: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:760: tatra kimete raśmyaharvāyusūryādayo 'dhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santo 'dhvanaikena yujyante,
GSP33brsvbh4u:761: āho yathāyathamadhvānamapi bhindantīti saṃdehe 'bhede 'pyadhvano bhāgabhedopapatterna bhāgibhedakalpanocitā,
GSP33brsvbh4u:764: athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt,
GSP33brsvbh4u:766: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya paryāptaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:769: na khalvekasminneva gantavye pathibhedamapekṣya tvarāvakalpyate kintu gantavyabhedādapi tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:770: yathā kaśmīrebhyo mathurāṃ kṣipraṃ yāti caitra iti tathehāpyanyataḥ kutaścidgantavyādanenopāyena brahmalokaṃ kṣipraṃ prayātīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:772: ayamarthaḥ-ekatvātprāptavyasya brahmalokasyālpaparvaṇā mārgeṇa tatprāptau saṃbhavantyāṃ bahumārgopadeśo vyarthaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:774: tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1//
GSP33brsvbh4u:779: ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate'iti
GSP33brsvbh4u:780: hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu vāyunimittamādityagamanaṃ 'sa ādityaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:788: bhavedetadevaṃ yadyūrdhvaśabdātkaścillokabhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tūparideśamātravācī lokabhedādvināparyavasyaṃllokabhedavācinādityapadenāditye vyavasthāpyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:790: pāṭhaḥ padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi siddham /
GSP33brsvbh4u:791: vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devalokaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:792: nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /
GSP33brsvbh4u:793: tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:794: tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:809: na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:812: na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //
GSP33brsvbh4u:813: jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:814: na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati hetutvamucyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:816: na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvamunneyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:817: yāvadvacanaṃ hi vācanikaṃ na tadavācye saṃcārayitumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:818: api cārcirādīnāṃ voḍhṛtve vidyudādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:820: tasmādbhogabhūmaya evārcirādayo nātivāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate-saṃpiṇḍakaraṇānāṃ hi sūkṣmadehavatāṃ gatau /
GSP33brsvbh4u:821: na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //
GSP33brsvbh4u:822: īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayaṃ vā prekṣāvato 'prekṣāvato vā prekṣāvatprayuktasya /
GSP33brsvbh4u:824: jīvātmāno mattamūrcchicavatsvayaṃ prekṣāvanto yadevaṃ svātantryeṇa gaccheyustadyadyarcirādayo
GSP33brsvbh4u:827: na caitebhyo 'nyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānāṃ caitanyasaṃbhave /
GSP33brsvbh4u:830: tasmādvyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarvādhyakṣatve yathā yathātvaṃ lokapālādīnāṃ svātantryamevamihāpyarcirādīnāmātivāhikatvameva darśanānusārācchabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:834: arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī nāpādāne /
GSP33brsvbh4u:840: yathā brāhmaṇamānaya bhojayitavya iti tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yadā tatsaṃnidhāvupanipatati padaṃ kaṇṭhādi(?)
GSP33brsvbh4u:846: vidyullokamāgato 'mānavaḥ puruṣo vaidyutastenaiva na tu varuṇādinā svayamuhyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:848: varuṇādayastu tatsāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāro bhavantīti ca vaiṣamyaṃ na voḍhṛtve iti sarvamavadātam //6//
GSP33brsvbh4u:851: kiṃ paraṃ brahma gamayatyāhosvidaparaṃ kāryaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:854: brahma gamayatītyatra hi napuṃsakaṃ brahmapadaṃ parasminneva brahmaṇi nirūḍhatvādanapekṣatayā mukhyamiti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇakalpanayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:857: kiñca tatra tatra parameva brahma prakṛtya prajāpatisadmapratipattyādaya ucyamānā nāparabrahmaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti prakaraṇavirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:858: na ca parasmintsarvagate gatirnopapadyate prāptatvāditi yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:860: yathaikasminnyagrodhapādape mūlādagramagrācca mūlaṃ gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasyaikenaiva nyagrodhapādapena nirantaraṃ saṃyogavibhāgā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:861: na caite tadavayavaviṣayī na tu nyagrodhaviṣayā iti sāmprataṃ tathā sati na śākhāmṛgo nyagrodhena yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:863: evaṃ dṛśyamānānāmapi tadavayavānāṃ na yogastadavayavayogāttadantena krameṇa tadavayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:864: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /
GSP33brsvbh4u:868: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /
GSP33brsvbh4u:870: yathā vidyākarmavaśādarcirādinā gatasya satyalokamatikramya paraṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lokamālokaṃ svayaṃ prakāśakamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:871: prāptasya tatraiva liṅgaṃ pralīyate na tu gatimevaṃbhūtāṃ vinā liṅgapravilaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:872: ata eva śrutiḥ- puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:873: tadanenābhisandhinā paraṃ brahma gamayatyamānava iti mene jaiminirācāryaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:880: advaitabrahmatattvasākṣātkāravatastu vigalitanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsavibhramasya na gantavyaṃ na gatirna gamayitāra iti kiṃ kena saṃgatam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:882: naca tatrāpi prāptaprāptiḥ karmajena hi vibhāgena niruddhāyāṃ pūrvaprāptāvaprāptasyaivottaraprāpterutpatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:883: etadapi vastuto vicārasahatayā sarvamanirvacanīyaṃ vijṛmbhitamavidyāyāḥ samutpannādvaitatattvasākṣātkāro na vidvānabhimanyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:886: paravidyāvata utkrāntipratiṣedhāt 'brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante'iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:887: yathā vidyābrahmaprāptyoḥ samānakālatā śrūyate- 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' 'ānandaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:888: brahmaṇo vidvānna bibheti' 'tadātmānameva vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti tatsarvamabhavat' 'tatra
GSP33brsvbh4u:889: ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ'iti paurvāparyāśravaṇāt paravidyāvato muktiṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:892: na khalu brahmaivedaṃ viśvamahaṃ brahmāsmīti paribhāvanābhuvā jīvātmano brahmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇonmūlitāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāmasti
GSP33brsvbh4u:895: śraddhāvihīnasya dṛṣṭārthāni karmāṇi phalanti na phalanti ca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:896: adṛṣṭārthānāṃ tu phale kā kathetyuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33brsvbh4u:897: na cārcirādimārgabhāvanāyāḥ parabrahmaprāptyarthamaviduṣaḥ pratyupadeśastathā ca karmāntareṣviva nityādiṣu tatrāpi syāttasya pravṛttirapi sāmpratam
GSP33brsvbh4u:900: na tāvadanapekṣā 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya'iti parabrahmavijñānādanyasyādhvanaḥ sākṣātpratiṣedhāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:901: paravidyāpekṣatve tu mārgabhāvanāyāḥ kimiyaṃ vidyākārye mārgabhāvanā sāhāyakamācaratyatha vidyotpāde /
GSP33brsvbh4u:902: na tāvadvidyākārye tayā saha tasyā dvaitādvaitagocaratayā mitho virodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:908: lokatvaṃ celāvṛttādivatsanniveśaviśeṣavati bhogabhūmau nirūḍhaṃ na kathañcidyogena prakāśe vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:910: aprāmāṇikānāṃ bahupralāpāḥ sarvagatasya dravyasya guṇāḥ sarvagatā eva caitanyānandādayaśca
GSP33brsvbh4u:911: guṇinaḥ paramātmano bhedābhedavanto guṇā ityādayo dūṣaṇāyānubhāṣyamāṇā apyaprāmāṇikatvamāvahantyasmākamityupekṣitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:912: granthayojanā tupratyagātmatvācca gantṝṇāṃ pratiprati añcati gacchatīti pratyak pratibhāvavṛtti brahma tadātmatvādgantṝṇāṃ jīvātmanāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:930: saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ saṃyujyatāmayaṃ punaḥ paramātmā nirastanikhilabhedaprapañcaḥ kūṭasthanityo
GSP33brsvbh4u:944: api ceyaṃ gatirna vicāraṃ sahata ityāha-gatikalpanāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:947: atha kasmādātyantikamananyatvaṃ na kalpyata ityata āha-atyantatādātmya iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:948: mṛdātmatayā hi svabhāvena ghaṭādayo bhāvāstadvikārā vyāptāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:949: tadabhāve na bhavanti śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatvābhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:950: vikārāvayavapakṣayośca tadvataḥ saha vikārāvayavaiḥsthiratvādacalatvādbrahmaṇaḥ saṃsāralakṣaṇaṃ gamanaṃ vikārāvayavayeranupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:952: anyānanyatve api caikasya virodhādasaṃbhavantī iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:954: tathāca brahmaṇyasaṃsaratyapi jīvasya saṃsāraḥ kalpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:961: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāvayavatvapariṇāmātyantabhedapakṣeṣu tāttvikī saṃsāriteti muktau svabhāvahānājjīvānāṃ vināśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:962: brahmavivartatve tu brahmaivaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratibimbānāmiva bimbaṃ taccāvināśīti na jīvavināśa ityāha-sarveṣveteṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:964: yathā hi kaphanimitto jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ prakṣaye kaphāntarotpattinimittadadhyādivarjane praśānto 'pi na punarbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:965: evaṃ karmanimitto bandha upāttānāṃ karmaṇāmupabhogātprakṣaye praśāmyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:966: karmāntarāmaṇāṃ ca bandhahetūnāmananuṣṭhānātkāraṇābhāve kāryānupapatterbandhābhāvātsvabhāvasiddho mokṣa ārogyamiva /
GSP33brsvbh4u:972: na cātropapattiḥ prabhavati saṃsārasyānāditayā karmāśayasyāpyasaṃkhyeyasyāniyatavipākakālasya bhogenocchettumaśakyatvādityāha-na caitattarkayitumapīti
GSP33brsvbh4u:976: yadi hi nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi sukṛtamapi duṣkṛtamiva nirvaheyustataḥ kāmyakarmopadeśā dattajalāñjalayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brsvbh4u:977: nahyasti kaściccāturvarṇye cāturāśramye vā yo na nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi karoti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:981: samyagdarśī hi viraktaḥ kāmyaniṣiddhe varjayannapi pramādādupanipatite tenaivasamyagdarśanena kṣapayati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:982: jñānaparipāke ca na karotyeva ajñastu nipuṇo 'pi pramādātkaroti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:983: kṛte ca na kṣapayituṃ kṣamata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:985: kartṛtvabhoktṛtve samākṣiptakriyābhoge te cedātmanaḥ svabhāvāvadhārite na tvāropite tato na śakyāvapanetum /
GSP33brsvbh4u:988: no khalu nīlamanīlaṃ śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi kartuṃ tadidamuktaṃ-svabhāvasyāparihāryatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:989: samāropitasya tvanirvacanīyasya tatsvabhāvasya śakyastattvajñānenāvaropaḥ kartuṃ sarpasyeva rajjutattvajñāneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:993: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayornimittasaṃbandhasya ca śaktidvāreṇa nityatvādbhaviṣyati kadācideṣāṃ samudācāro yataḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhojyete iti saṃbhāvanātaḥ kutaḥ kaivalyaniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:999: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.10 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1005: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca / BBs_4,3.15 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1008: santi hi mano brahmetyupāsītetyādyāḥ pratīkaviṣayā vidyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1009: tadvanto 'pyarcirādimārgeṇa kāryabrahmopāsakā iva gantumarhanti 'aniyamaḥ sarvāsām'ityaviśeṣeṇa vidyāntareṣvapi gateravadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1011: naca brahmakratava eva brahmalokabhājo nātatkratava ityapyekāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1013: na caite na brahmakratavo mano brahmetyupāsītetyādau sarvatra brahmānugamena tatkratutvasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1018: kimiva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iha tu tadabhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1019: 'taṃ yathāyathopāsate tadeva bhavati'iti śruterautsargikyānnāsati viśeṣavacane 'pavādo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1023: āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1024: brahmāśrayaśca pratyayo nāmādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1029: na hyevamubhayathābhāva ubhayathārthatve kāṃścitpratīkālambanānna nayati vikāralambanānviduṣastu
GSP33brsvbh4u:1033: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3// ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh4u:1037: prāgabhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛtvaṃ na sato yataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1046: sveneti prāptamanūdyata iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-saṃbhavatyarthavattve hi nānarthakyamupeyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1048: anadhigatāvabodhanaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ śābdamagatyā kathañcidanuvādatayā varṇyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1051: sata iva ghaṭādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena bandhavigamasyāpi niṣpatterlokasiddhatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1062: nanu jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparyaśravaṇāt svarūpaniṣpatteranyā jyotirupasaṃpattiḥ tathāca bhautikatve 'pi na mokṣavyāghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1063: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi jyotirupasaṃpadya tat parityajediti śrūyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1064: tadadhyāhāre 'pi tatpratipādanavaiyarthyaṃ tadaparityāge ca jyotiṣaiva svena rūpeṇeti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1065: tasya ca bhūtatve vikāratvānmaraṇadharmakatvaprasiddheramuktitvamiti prāpte pratyucyate-jyotiṣpadasya mukhyatvaṃ bhautike yadyapi sthitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1067: paraṃ jyotiriti hi parapadasamabhivyāhārātparatvasya cānapekṣasya brahmaṇyeva pravṛttejyotiṣi cāpare kiñcidapekṣya paratvātparaṃ jyotiriti vākyādātmaivātra gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1069: yat saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tanmukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītivat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1073: yadyapi jīvātmā brahmaṇo na bhinna iti tatra tatropapāditaṃ tathāpi sa tatra paryetītyādhārādheyabhāvavyapadeśasya saṃpattṛsaṃpattavyabhāvavyapadeśasya ca samādhānārthamāha //4//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1076: upanyāsa uddeśo jñātasya yathā ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1078: yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣadramamāṇa iti,
GSP33brsvbh4u:1079: tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatītyetadajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1087: muktaḥ saṃpadyate svairityāha sma kila jaiminiḥ //
GSP33brsvbh4u:1088: na ca citsvabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvātmāno 'pahatapāpmatvādayo bhāvātmanaśca sarvajñatvādayo dharmā advaitaṃ ghnanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1097: atha na bhidyante tata ekasmādātmano 'bhedānmitho 'pi na bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1101: naca dharmiṇa ātmano na bhidyante mithastu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1104: bhedābhedau ca parasparavirodhādekatrābhāvānna saṃbhavata ityupapāditaṃ prathame sūtre /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1105: abhāvarūpāṇāmadvaitāvihantṛtve 'pi tasya pāpmādeḥ kālpanikatayā tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā teṣāmapi kālpanikatvamiti na tāttvikī taddharmatā śliṣyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:1108: tadidamuktaṃ-śabdavikalpajā evaite apahatapāpmatvādayo na tu sāṃvyavahārikā apīti //6//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1110: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ / BBs_4,4.7 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1116: apahatapāpmasatyakāmatvādayastvaupādhikatayātāttvikā api vyāvahārikapramāṇopanītatayā lokasiddhā nātyantāsanto yena tacchabdā rāhoḥ śira itivadavāstavā ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1121: loke hi kañcidarthaṃ cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate samīhānastamarthamāpnotīti kramo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1123: tena śrutyāpi lokavṛttamanurudhyamānayā viduṣastādṛśa eva kramo 'numantavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1124: avadhāraṇaṃ tu saṃkalpādeveti laukikaṃ yatnagauravamapekṣya vidyāprabhāvato viduṣo yatnalāghavāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1127: yathā manorathamātropasthāpitā strī straiṇānāṃ caramadhātuvisargaheturevaṃ pitrādayo
GSP33brsvbh4u:1128: 'pyasya saṃkalpopasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante svakāryāyetyata āha-naca saṃkalpamātrasamutthāpanā iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1129: santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1131: tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1132: nahi straiṇasya romaharṣādivadbhavanti strīvastusādhyā maṇimālādayastadidamuktaṃpuṣkalaṃ bhogamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate- pitrādīnāṃ samutthānaṃ saṃkalpādeva tacchruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1134: pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā bādhitum /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1135: anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1138: tathāhurāgaminaḥ-ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte 'gastya iva samudraṃ pibati sa iva daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1143: abhāvaṃ bādarir āha hy evam / BBs_4,4.10 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1146: anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena stutirbhavatyeveti
GSP33brsvbh4u:1152: ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1155: yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1158: tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ //11//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1161: manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo niyamavādau pūrvayorna sahate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1164: kāmeṣu hi ramaṇaṃ samanaskendriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ siddhameveti nāsti śaṅkā manoyogasyeti tadvyavacchedo vyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1170: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1171: evaṃ tasyaiva dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanena niyatakartṛparimāṇatvena dvirātreṇa yajatetyādivadahīnatvamapi gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1172: saṃprati śarīrendriyābhāvena manomātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavatsūkṣmo bhogo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1175: yadi punaḥ suṣuptavadabhogo bhavet naiṣā śrutirupapadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1188: prādeśikaḥ sanna dehāntarāṇi svabhāvanirmitānyapi nānāpradeśavartīni sāntaḥkaraṇo
GSP33brsvbh4u:1195: evaṃ nirmāṇaśarīrāṇyapi sendriyāṇīti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-śarīratvaṃ na jātu syādbhogādhiṣṭhānatāṃ vinā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1196: sa tridheti śarīratvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca tadvibhau //
GSP33brsvbh4u:1197: sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhetyādikā śrutirviduṣo nānābhāvamācakṣāṇā bhinnaśarīrendriyopādhisaṃbandhe 'vakalpate nādehahetu(bhūta)bhede
GSP33brsvbh4u:1198: nahi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayanyantravāho nānātvenāpadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1199: bhogādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ ca śarīratvaṃ nābhogādhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣviva yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1202: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1203: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1204: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1210: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1216: āsu kāścicchrutayaḥ suṣuptimapekṣya kāścittu saṃpattiṃ tadadhikārāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1217: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1222: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa ivānyānadhīnatvamaiśvaryamavagamyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:1223: nanvasya brahmopāsanālabdhamaiśvaryaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhīnaṃ na tu svabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1228: na ca viduṣāṃ parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryasiddhitvāttadgatamaiśvaryaṃ yena laukikā iva rājāno mahārājādhīnaḥ svavyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvarādhīnā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1229: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1230: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1232: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato 'dhikāstatsamāstu bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1235: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1237: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1238: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1244: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1248: sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate //17 //
GSP33brsvbh4u:1253: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1256: vikāravarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha / BBs_4,4.19 /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1259: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti nirvikāramāha rūpam //19//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1262: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1263: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti tadanena vyabhicārayate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1264: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:1266: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1268: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi
GSP33brsvbh4u:1275: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1276: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1278: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti //21//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1291: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha-nityasiddheti //22//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1293: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1304: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ /
